Package Business

Class RegisterException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
Business.UserException
Business.RegisterException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RegisterException
extends UserException
The type Register exception. Meant to catch any errors during a new User's Register to the game.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String CAPS_ERROR
    The message CAPS_ERROR explaining that the password must have an upper case letter.
    static java.lang.String DIGIT_ERROR
    The message DIGIT_ERROR explaining that digits must be from 0 to 9.
    static java.lang.String EMAIL_ERROR
    The message EMAIL_ERROR explaining that the email's format is incorrect.
    static java.lang.String EMAIL_EXIST_ERROR
    The error EMAIL_EXIST_ERROR shown when the given email is already registered in the Databases.
    static java.lang.String LENGTH_ERROR
    The message LENGTH_ERROR thrown when the password is shorter that 8 letters/symbols.
    static java.lang.String LOWER_ERROR
    The message LOWER_ERROR explaining that the password must have an lower case letter.
    static java.lang.String REPEAT_ERROR
    The message REPEAT_ERROR thrown when the password validation gives a mismatch.
    static java.lang.String SYMBOL_ERROR
    The message SYMBOL_ERROR explaining that the password must have a symbol such as: @, #, $ or %.
    static java.lang.String USER_EXIST_ERROR
    The message USER_EXIST_ERROR shown when the given user is already registered in the Databases.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegisterException

      public RegisterException​(boolean DigitOk, boolean CapsOk, boolean LowerOk, boolean SymbolOk, boolean LengthOk)
      Constructor with a message, to be used for general Password Exceptions
      Parameters:
      DigitOk - Boolean value from password Validation done in UserModel, indicates all digits are correct.
      CapsOk - Boolean value from password Validation done in UserModel, indicates there is at least one upperCase letter.
      LowerOk - Boolean value from password Validation done in UserModel, indicates there is at least one lowerCase letter.
      SymbolOk - Boolean value from password Validation done in UserModel, indicates there is at least one symbol.
      LengthOk - Boolean value from password Validation done in UserModel, indicates that the password length is over 8 letters/symbols.

    • RegisterException

      public RegisterException​(boolean EmailOk)
      Constructor with a message, to be used for general Email Exceptions.
      Parameters:
      EmailOk - Boolean value from email Validation done in UserModel.
